page.title: 06J SAINBURYS PLC
page.content: The Sainsbury's on the 6 acre site at Bath was completed in November 1983 it took just over a year to build and on buying the land had to renovate Green Park Station. The main building covers 26,000 sq.ft. sales area and 20,000 sq.ft. storage area. Sainsbury's employs 350 to 400 people, mostly part time. More staff are employed at christmas and easter. The large car park provides a vital service for customers and city centre workers. It holds 242 cars. On a good day it is full from 9am to 9pm. The small car park holds 190 cars and is only full on Thurs.Fri. and Sat. Between 20,000 and 24,000 car park tickets are dispenced each week and for those people who shop in Sainsbury's parking is free for 2hrs.
